content.raw:
I was talking about the expectation from a pure user side of things.

And as it currently works just fine I would (as already stated) want to keep that feature/bug. 

Wether you guys feel like rejecting this pull request or not is up to you. But I'd say we name the bug a feature and we might as well add some progress bars and make the abort button more sensible to remove bugs from said feature. This gives us more time to improve the compile process and doesn't really hurt anyone.
content.html:
I was talking about the expectation from a pure user side of things.

And as it currently works just fine I would (as already stated) want to keep that feature/bug.

Wether you guys feel like rejecting this pull request or not is up to you. But I'd say we name the bug a feature and we might as well add some progress bars and make the abort button more sensible to remove bugs from said feature. This gives us more time to improve the compile process and doesn't really hurt anyone.
